name: NSF Arctic Data Center
file_types: NetCDF, CSV, shp, TIFF, JPEG, wav, Excel, and many others
status: The service is operated at UC Santa Barbara and data are all stored on non-governmental servers there, so at this point should be secure from federal policy changes. Replication of data to NCEI is in the plans. A copy of all data are also on Amazon's S3 service in a private bucket for the time being.

name: Pesticide National Synthesis Project
org: USGS NAWQA: Pesticide National Synthesis Project

desc_url: The New England Power Pool Generation Information System (NEPOOL GIS) issues and tracks certificates for all MWh of generation and load produced in the ISO New England control area, as well as imported MWh from adjacent control areas. The NEPOOL GIS offers a set of Public Reports which describe activity within the system at an aggregate level. The NEPOOL GIS does not disclose account holder specific data to the public.
